articles.title: Namibian Cheetah Sasha Dies In Madhya Pradesh From Kidney Disease - NDTV
articles.description: One of the eight cheetahs that was relocated to India from South Africa died on Monday after developing a kidney infection in January.
articles.content:
A medical examination revealed that she was dehydrated and had kidney-related problems. (File)
Madhya Pradesh: One of the eight cheetahs that was relocated to India from Namibia died on Monday after… [+1805 chars]
